headline: Caterpillar Inc. (CAT): “You’re Making A Lot Of Money” If You’re Involved In AI Build Out, Says Jim Cramer

headline: Argan: Strong Backlog, Secular Growth Tailwinds, And Fair Valuations
summary: Argan recorded a $1.9B backlog, improved margins, and a focus on power infra investments is driving sustainable multi-year revenue growth. Read more on AGX stock.
